Setting.Name: Frontend::NavBarModule###1-TicketProcesses
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration (disable ticket processes screen if no process available).

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketProcess
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketProcess###002-ProcessManagement
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentTicketProcess###002-ProcessManagement
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###9800-TicketProcessTransitions
Setting.Description: Event module registration. For more performance you can define a trigger event (e. g. Event => TicketCreate).

Setting.Name: Process::DynamicFieldProcessManagementProcessID
Setting.Description: This option defines the dynamic field in which a Process Management process entity id is stored.

Setting.Name: Process::DynamicFieldProcessManagementActivityID
Setting.Description: This option defines the dynamic field in which a Process Management activity entity id is stored.

Setting.Name: Process::DefaultQueue
Setting.Description: This option defines the process tickets default queue.

Setting.Name: Process::DefaultState
Setting.Description: This option defines the process tickets default state.

Setting.Name: Process::DefaultLock
Setting.Description: This option defines the process tickets default lock.

Setting.Name: Process::DefaultPriority
Setting.Description: This option defines the process tickets default priority.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoom###ProcessDisplay
Setting.Description: Display settings to override defaults for Process Tickets.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoom###ProcessWidgetDynamicFieldGroups
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields groups for process widget. The key is the name of the group, the value contains the fields to be shown. Example: 'Key => My Group', 'Content: Name_X, NameY'.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoom###ProcessWidgetDynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the process widget in ticket zoom screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###480-Process
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to enroll a ticket into a process in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerTicketProcess
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::CustomerTicketProcess###002-ProcessManagement
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Navigation###CustomerTicketProcess###002-ProcessManagement
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::NavBarModule###10-CustomerTicketProcesses
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration (disable ticket processes screen if no process available) for Customer.

Setting.Name: Process::Entity::Prefix
Setting.Description: Default ProcessManagement entity prefixes for entity IDs that are automatically generated.

Setting.Name: Process::CacheTTL
Setting.Description: Cache time in seconds for the DB process backend.

Setting.Name: Process::NavBarOutput::CacheTTL
Setting.Description: Cache time in seconds for the ticket process navigation bar output module.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketProcess###StateType
Setting.Description: Determines the next possible ticket states, for process tickets in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketProcess###ProcessListTreeView
Setting.Description: Shows existing parent/child (separated by ::) process lists in the form of a tree or a list.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerTicketProcess###StateType
Setting.Description: Determines the next possible ticket states, for process tickets in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerTicketProcess###ProcessListTreeView
Setting.Description: Shows existing parent/child (separated by ::) process lists in the form of a tree or a list.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketProcess::CustomerIDReadOnly
Setting.Description: Controls if CustomerID is read-only in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ProcessManagement::Transition::Debug::Enabled
Setting.Description: If enabled debugging information for transitions is logged.

Setting.Name: ProcessManagement::Transition::Debug::LogPriority
Setting.Description: Defines the priority in which the information is logged and presented.

Setting.Name: ProcessManagement::Transition::Debug::Filter###00-Default
Setting.Description: Filter for debugging Transitions. Note: More filters can be added in the format <OTRS_TICKET_Attribute> e.g. <OTRS_TICKET_Priority>.

Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###0140-RunningTicketProcess
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the running process tickets overview of the agent interface . "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin. "Mandatory" determines if the plugin is always shown and can not be removed by agents.

Hash.Item: All tickets with a reminder set where the reminder date has been reached

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###ProcessID
Setting.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###ActivityID
Setting.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

Setting.Name: ProcessManagement::TransitionAction::DefaultParameters###001-Framework
Setting.Description: Defines the default keys and values for the transition action module parameters. Mandatory fields are marked with "(* required)". Note: For most of the keys the AttributeID can also be used, e.g. "Owner" can be "OwnerID". Keys that define the same Attribute should only be used once, e.g. "Owner" and "OwnerID" are redundant.

Hash.Item: (* required for Custom) 12 (number of time units)
(* required for Custom) beforestart|afterstart|beforeend|afterend (Possible notification types for the "relative" type)
(optional) AppointmentID (dynamic field for saving the appointment ID (suitable for linking the appointment later)
(* required for Custom) 12 (number of time units)
(* required for Custom) beforestart|afterstart|beforeend|afterend (Possible notification types for the "relative" type)
(* required if both Cc and Bcc are not present) Some Customer A customer-a@example.co
(* required if both To and Bcc are not present) Some Customer B customer-b@example.co
(* required if both To and Cc are not present) Some Customer C customer-c@example.co
Attachment 1, Attachment 2 (add attachment of the admin interface)
(optional) Template 1 (use template to replace in Body by Tag OTRS_TA_TEMPLATE)
(optional) Salutation 1 (use salutation to replace in Body by Tag OTRS_TA_SALUTATION)
(optional) Signature 1 (use signature to replace in Body by Tag OTRS_TA_SIGNATURE)
(* required if both PostMasterSearch and UserIDs are not present) UserLogin1, UserLogin2, UserLogin3
(* required if both UserLogin and UserIDs are not present) UserLogin1@znuny.com, UserLogin2@znuny.com, UserLogin3@znuny.com
(* required if both UserLogin and PostMasterSearch are not present) 1, 2, 3
